verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6258"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H5921"\w*, \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w This|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H3541"\w* witnessed \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w when|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* ambushed \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w attack|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w devote|strong="H2763"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2763"\w* \f + \fr 15:3 \ft Forms of the Hebrew cherem refer to the giving over of things or persons to the LORD, either by destroying them or by giving them as an offering; also in verses 8, 9, 15, 18, 20, and 21.\f* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* women, \w children|strong="H5768"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w infants|strong="H5768"\w*, \w oxen|strong="H7794"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w*.’”

\w So|strong="H6485"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w summoned|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* \w them|strong="H6485"\w* \w at|strong="H7586"\w* \w Telaim|strong="H2923"\w*—200,000 \w foot|strong="H7273"\w* \w soldiers|strong="H7273"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* 10,000 \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w came|strong="H7586"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* lay \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w wait|strong="H7378"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w valley|strong="H5158"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* warned \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Kenites|strong="H7017"\w*, “\w Since|strong="H5927"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w showed|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w when|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w on|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w get|strong="H3212"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w*. \w Otherwise|strong="H6435"\w* \w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* sweep \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*.” \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Kenites|strong="H7017"\w* moved \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7586"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w way|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Havilah|strong="H2341"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Shur|strong="H7793"\w*, which \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w east|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w captured|strong="H8610"\w* Agag \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*, \w but|strong="H5971"\w* \w devoted|strong="H2763"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w others|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2763"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w spared|strong="H2550"\w* Agag, \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w best|strong="H4315"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w cattle|strong="H1241"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fat \w calves|strong="H1241"\w* \f + \fr 15:9 \ft Or the grown bulls\f* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3733"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w best|strong="H4315"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w else|strong="H3808"\w*. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w unwilling|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w destroy|strong="H2763"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w devoted|strong="H2763"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2763"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w was|strong="H7586"\w* despised \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w worthless|strong="H3808"\w*. Samuel Denounces Saul

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w regret|strong="H5162"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H4427"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* following \w Me|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w carried|strong="H6965"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w instructions|strong="H1697"\w*.” \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w distressed|strong="H2734"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

\w Early|strong="H7925"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w got|strong="H7925"\w* \w up|strong="H5324"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w confront|strong="H5046"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w but|strong="H2009"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H7586"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w*, “\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w has|strong="H7586"\w* \w gone|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w has|strong="H7586"\w* \w set|strong="H5324"\w* \w up|strong="H5324"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w monument|strong="H3027"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w himself|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w has|strong="H7586"\w* \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w gone|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w reached|strong="H1697"\w* \w him|strong="H1288"\w*, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H1288"\w*, “\w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w*. \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w carried|strong="H6965"\w* \w out|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w instructions|strong="H1697"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H8085"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* replied, “\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w bleating|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w lowing|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w cattle|strong="H1241"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*?”

\w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* answered, “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Amalekites|strong="H6003"\w*; \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w spared|strong="H2550"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w best|strong="H4315"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w cattle|strong="H1241"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w but|strong="H3498"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rest|strong="H3498"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w devoted|strong="H2763"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2763"\w*.”

“Stop!” exclaimed \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*. “\w Let|strong="H7503"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w what|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* last \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.” “\w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*,” \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* said, “\w Although|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* once \w small|strong="H6996"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* become \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mission|strong="H1870"\w*, saying, ‘\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w devote|strong="H2763"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2763"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinful|strong="H2400"\w* \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w*. \w Fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* wiped \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w*.’

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*? \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* rush \w upon|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w plunder|strong="H7998"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*?”

“\w But|strong="H8085"\w* \w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,” \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* replied. “\w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w mission|strong="H1870"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*. \w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w brought|strong="H3212"\w* \w back|strong="H3212"\w* Agag \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w devoted|strong="H2763"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2763"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3947"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w cattle|strong="H1241"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w plunder|strong="H7998"\w*, \w the|strong="H3947"\w* best \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w things|strong="H2764"\w* \w devoted|strong="H2764"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2764"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* order \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H2009"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w declared|strong="H8085"\w*: “\w Does|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w delight|strong="H2656"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* much \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w obedience|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*? \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w obedience|strong="H8085"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* attentiveness \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* rams.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w rebellion|strong="H4805"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w divination|strong="H7081"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* arrogance \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* wickedness \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w idolatry|strong="H8655"\w*. \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.” Saul’s Confession

\w Then|strong="H5674"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w instructions|strong="H1697"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.
